programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: There was a golden age of female serial killers in the U.S. and Europe; female serial killers that targeted their children, husbands, and other family members.

programme.desc: A NATO task force tracks a Nazi war criminal and stumbles upon an army of walking dead Nazi soldiers killing their way across Europe.

programme.title: Creature From the Haunted Sea
programme.desc: After political unrest breaks out on a Caribbean island, scheming criminal Renzo Capetto (Anthony Carbone) promises to transport a group of exiles out of the country while also taking part of the national treasury.

programme.title: Aenigma
programme.desc: The spirit of a comatose teen girl possesses the body of a newcomer to her girls boarding school to enact bloody revenge against the elitist, lingerie-clad coeds responsible for her condition.

programme.desc: A retired detective is asked to investigate an old missing family case.
